name: Policy Type And Amount
description:
This data type specifies the policy type and amount covered by the insurance.

Note: Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.7.29 IN2-29, as of v 2.5.

fields.name: Policy Type
fields.description:
Specifies the policy type.

Refer to User-defined Table 0147 - Policy Type for suggested values.

fields.name: Amount Class
fields.description:
Specifies the amount quantity class.

Refer to User-defined Table 0193 - Amount Class for suggested values.

fields.name: Money Or Percentage Quantity
fields.description: Attention: The PTA.3 component was deprecated as of v2.5 and the detail was withdrawn and removed from the standard as of v 2.7. Refer to PTA.4 instead.

fields.name: Money Or Percentage
fields.description: Specifies an amount that may be either currency or a percentage.
